title: Welcome Back, My Dear - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Horror   Psychological   Romance   Sci-fi   Tragedy
tags: Artificial Intelligence   Award-winning Work   Clones   Crime   Death of Loved Ones   Familial Love   Human Experimentation   Identity Crisis   Obsessive Love   Oneshot   Scientists   Short Story   Tragic Past
author: 機人レンジ
description:
A scientist who lost his wife in an unforeseen accident.

He set out to create a clone of his wife because of loneliness.

But just before the birth of the clone, he was converted and the clone was discarded.

But then for a while. Scientists who are subjected to guilt will receive unexpected punishment.

The runaway of the science which does not stop. The sci-fi short short of two men who are crazy for love, depicting their sins and punishments.>
